Rikucheru.\""},{"lineNumber":162172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「　今思い返しても恐ろしい女ですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even now, looking back, she is a terrifying woman.\""},{"lineNumber":162173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美人か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was she beautiful?\""},{"lineNumber":162174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……年の頃は20。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha... around 20 years old.\""},{"lineNumber":162175,"originalJapaneseLine":"「　それは見目麗しい女性でしたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She was a visually lovely woman.\""},{"lineNumber":162176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「10年は昔のことでしたので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was about ten years ago,\""},{"lineNumber":162177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今も生きていれば30ですかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"so if she were still alive now, she'd be about 30.\""},{"lineNumber":162178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、じゃあパスだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, then I'll pass...\""},{"lineNumber":162179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとか撃退は出来たのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We somehow managed to repel her, but...\""},{"lineNumber":162180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔女リクチェルは呪いの力で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The witch Rikucheru, using her curse power,\""},{"lineNumber":162181,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂をこのような姿に変えましたじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"transformed me into this kind of form.\""},{"lineNumber":162182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このようなってのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When you say 'this kind of form,' you mean,\""},{"lineNumber":162183,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その着ぐるみ姿だな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"this mascot costume appearance, right?\""},{"lineNumber":162184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいですじゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's correct.\""},{"lineNumber":162185,"originalJapaneseLine":"　生きており思考も出来ます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am alive and can think.\""},{"lineNumber":162186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが、喋る以外はなにも出来ません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, aside from speaking, I can't do anything else.\""},{"lineNumber":162187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝たきりのようなものですな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's like being bedridden...\""},{"lineNumber":162188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……大変ですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's... tough, isn't it...\""},{"lineNumber":162189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、それでも軍の指揮能力を買われ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, but even so, my command abilities were recognized by the army,\""},{"lineNumber":162190,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普段は副将などに担がれて活動しておりました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and usually I was carried around by deputy generals for my activities.\""},{"lineNumber":162191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなある日のことですじゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"One particular day,\""},{"lineNumber":162192,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂の体を孫のアスカが着たのです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"my granddaughter Asuka wore my body.\""},{"lineNumber":162193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すると不思議なことにアスカの体を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, oddly, I was able to use Asuka's body,\""},{"lineNumber":162194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　儂も使うことが出来、しかも魔法まで使えました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and even use magic.\""},{"lineNumber":162195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「他の親族でも試しましたが出来ません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We tried with other relatives too, but it didn't work.\""},{"lineNumber":162196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恐らく血の繋がりとアスカの魔力の高さが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Probably the blood connection and Asuka's high magical power\""},{"lineNumber":162197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それを成功させたようですじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"were what made that possible...\""},{"lineNumber":162198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「現在は孫娘のアスカに着てもらうことで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Currently, by having my granddaughter Asuka wear it,\""},{"lineNumber":162199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アスカの体を代わりに動かして、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I move Asuka's body instead,\""},{"lineNumber":162200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍としての仕事をしている状態で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and am performing my duties as a general...\""},{"lineNumber":162201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、しかし戦場にまで顔を出すとは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, but she even shows up on the battlefield,\""},{"lineNumber":162202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中々根性の据わったガキだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"she's quite a gutsy kid.\""},{"lineNumber":162203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いいえ、アスカは怖がりですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, Asuka is actually quite timid.\""},{"lineNumber":162204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでも、国の危機の為と儂が身勝手にも頼み、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still, I selfishly asked her because of the country's crisis,\""},{"lineNumber":162205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こうして儂を着てくれておるのですじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"and she is wearing me like this.\""},{"lineNumber":162206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひとえには、じーじの為に、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All for grandpa's sake,\""},{"lineNumber":162207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":162208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuwaa~.\" (yawn sound)"},{"lineNumber":162209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んい……なんのおはなしぃ〜？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn... what are you talking about~?\""},{"lineNumber":162210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、すまんのアスカ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, sorry Asuka.\""},{"lineNumber":162211,"originalJapaneseLine":"　騒がしくして起こしてしもうたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did the noise wake you up?\""},{"lineNumber":162212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、らんすだぁ〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah~ it's Rance~.\""},{"lineNumber":162213,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ね、ね、あそぼう〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, let's play~\""},{"lineNumber":162214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これこれ、総統になんと失礼な口を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-This, this is such rude talk to the Supreme Commander...\""},{"lineNumber":162215,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、うるさい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, noisy.\""},{"lineNumber":162216,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様はやかましいガキは嫌いなんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't like noisy kids.\""},{"lineNumber":162217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、シィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Shiru.\""},{"lineNumber":162218,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チョコでもやって追い出せ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Give her some chocolate and send her away.\""},{"lineNumber":162219,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすっ、わかりました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, understood.\""},{"lineNumber":162220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はい、アスカちゃん、良かったらどうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here you go, Asuka-chan, please have some if you'd like.\""},{"lineNumber":162221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くれるの？　たべていいの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're giving it to me? Can I eat it?\""},{"lineNumber":162222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……おお、ランス殿のご厚意じゃ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Oh, it's Lord Rance's kindness.\""},{"lineNumber":162223,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頂いておきなさい、アスカ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You should accept it, Asuka.\""},{"lineNumber":162224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがと〜、らんす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Rance~\""},{"lineNumber":162225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph.\""},{"lineNumber":162226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貰ったらとっととどっか行け」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once you get it, hurry up and go somewhere else.\""},{"lineNumber":162227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすくす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":162228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに笑ってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What are you laughing at?\""},{"lineNumber":162229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ、いたた、すみません、ランス様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, ouch, sorry, Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":162230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ありがとうございますじゃ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thank you very much,\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔女の名はリクチェル。」
「　今思い返しても恐ろしい女ですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even now, looking back, she is a terrifying woman."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美人か？」
「はあ……年の頃は20。」
「　それは見目麗しい女性でしたな」
「10年は昔のことでしたので、
今も生きていれば30ですかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "so if she were still alive now, she'd be about 30."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む、じゃあパスだな……」
「なんとか撃退は出来たのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We somehow managed to repel her, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔女リクチェルは呪いの力で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The witch Rikucheru, using her curse power,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂をこのような姿に変えましたじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "transformed me into this kind of form."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このようなってのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When you say 'this kind of form,' you mean,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その着ぐるみ姿だな？」
「はいですじゃ。
生きており思考も出来ます」
「ですが、喋る以外はなにも出来ません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, aside from speaking, I can't do anything else."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝たきりのようなものですな……」
「それは……大変ですね……」
「ええ、それでも軍の指揮能力を買われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, but even so, my command abilities were recognized by the army,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は副将などに担がれて活動しておりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and usually I was carried around by deputy generals for my activities."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなある日のことですじゃ
儂の体を孫のアスカが着たのです」
「すると不思議なことにアスカの体を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, oddly, I was able to use Asuka's body,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂も使うことが出来、しかも魔法まで使えました」
「他の親族でも試しましたが出来ません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We tried with other relatives too, but it didn't work."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐らく血の繋がりとアスカの魔力の高さが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably the blood connection and Asuka's high magical power"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを成功させたようですじゃ……」
「現在は孫娘のアスカに着てもらうことで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Currently, by having my granddaughter Asuka wear it,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスカの体を代わりに動かして、
将軍としての仕事をしている状態で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and am performing my duties as a general..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、しかし戦場にまで顔を出すとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, but she even shows up on the battlefield,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々根性の据わったガキだな」
「……いいえ、アスカは怖がりですじゃ」
「それでも、国の危機の為と儂が身勝手にも頼み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, I selfishly asked her because of the country's crisis,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして儂を着てくれておるのですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she is wearing me like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひとえには、じーじの為に、と」
「……ふーん」
「ふわぁ〜。
んい……なんのおはなしぃ〜？」
「おお、すまんのアスカ。
騒がしくして起こしてしもうたか？」
「あー、らんすだぁ〜。
ね、ね、あそぼう〜」
「こ、これこれ、総統になんと失礼な口を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This, this is such rude talk to the Supreme Commander..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うるさい。
俺様はやかましいガキは嫌いなんだ」
「おい、シィル。
チョコでもやって追い出せ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Give her some chocolate and send her away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすっ、わかりました。
はい、アスカちゃん、良かったらどうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here you go, Asuka-chan, please have some if you'd like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くれるの？　たべていいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're giving it to me? Can I eat it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おお、ランス殿のご厚意じゃ。
頂いておきなさい、アスカ」
「ありがと〜、らんす」
「ふんっ。
貰ったらとっととどっか行け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once you get it, hurry up and go somewhere else."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすくす」
「なに笑ってる」
「あいたっ、いたた、すみません、ランス様！」
「……ありがとうございますじゃ、

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「それでも、国の危機の為と儂が身勝手にも頼み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still, I selfishly asked her because of the country's crisis,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして儂を着てくれておるのですじゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "and she is wearing me like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひとえには、じーじの為に、と」
「……ふーん」
「ふわぁ〜。
んい……なんのおはなしぃ〜？」
「おお、すまんのアスカ。
騒がしくして起こしてしもうたか？」
「あー、らんすだぁ〜。
ね、ね、あそぼう〜」
「こ、これこれ、総統になんと失礼な口を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-This, this is such rude talk to the Supreme Commander..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー、うるさい。
俺様はやかましいガキは嫌いなんだ」
「おい、シィル。
チョコでもやって追い出せ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Give her some chocolate and send her away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすっ、わかりました。
はい、アスカちゃん、良かったらどうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here you go, Asuka-chan, please have some if you'd like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くれるの？　たべていいの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're giving it to me? Can I eat it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おお、ランス殿のご厚意じゃ。
頂いておきなさい、アスカ」
「ありがと〜、らんす」
「ふんっ。
貰ったらとっととどっか行け」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Once you get it, hurry up and go somewhere else."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くすくす」
「なに笑ってる」
「あいたっ、いたた、すみません、ランス様！」
「……ありがとうございますじゃ、
